title: The doue: or Passages of cosmography. By Richard Zouche ciuillian, of New Colledge in Oxford
author: Zouch, Richard, 1590-1661.
publisher: Printed [by Thomas Snodham] for George Norton, and are to be sould at his shop vnder the blacke Bell, neere Temple-barre,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
